website_summaries.verdict: A powerful, well-balanced laptop that's reasonably priced and has ample features that suit most consumers needs.
pros: The system’s OS downgrade from Windows 10 to Windows 7 Pro is a plus for dedicated gamers, particularly those with older games
Its Core i5 processor isn’t the newest, but balances well with the memory and SSD setup
cons: The downside of the OS is that upgrading this computer further may be difficult

customer_reviews.title: Needed an upgrade for my small business
customer_reviews.text: This Tecra was ordered with the memory, speed, and capacity to support my small business needs for at least the next few years. We have other Tecras and they have performed very well for us over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Beadcr

customer_reviews.title: Good Computer but Toshiba needs to work on customer service
customer_reviews.text: So far a good computer. The only issue I had was with the battery not charging properly. I called Toshiba customer service and after an hour, the only thing they could say was send the computer to an authorized dealer (nowhere near me) and generally about 10 days later they may have it back to you. I would have to have erased everything to do that and be without a computer for 10 days (if lucky) or more. Unacceptable. I contacted Amazon and they took care of the situation and got me a new battery. It works perfectly and I have had no problems now. Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: 1 TB solid state drive 8th gen quad 4 bluetooth HDMI
customer_reviews.text: Have had for 3 months now. Originally I had wanted to buy from Toshiba with all the latest accessories like finger print ID backlit keyboard and face recognition. Extras would have been worth the extra money but I decided what I really needed was the memory and DVDRW drive. I have a huge music collection and windows 10 pro comes with latest media player (free at Microsoft store). The ability to just ask what you want to search for (song recognition if playing a song), is Nice! Well worth the price on Amazon and better than anything I have found in 6 months of research.
customer_reviews.author: USA Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Lack of back-lighting on keyboard is annoying.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good laptop, but I can't believe I paid this much for a laptop and Toshiba doesn't provide a back-lighting on the keyboard. I thought it wouldn't matter much, but it's really annoying in low-light situations. Not just in the dark, which I would expect, but even in dimly lit rooms it's very hard to see the keyboard. My previous Toshiba laptop cost hundreds of dollars less and had a back-lit keyboard, so I'm not sure why Toshiba dropped that simple feature on a higher priced model. I won't buy a laptop without this feature again.
customer_reviews.author: Bookmouser

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: It’s not that the computer is a rotten computer. It’s just that I hate that if my printer is low on color ink, the printer function is inoperable even for black and white only copies. That’s a function brought on by this specific computer, because when I use the print function on my other Toshiba PC, it will print. Also, the way you have to use two fingers on the touchpad to scroll is a royal pain. I find myself going back to my very sturdy earlier model Toshiba. The flimsy plastic this thing is made of is a joke on the consumer who just paid $1300 on a laptop ... namely me! Super disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: ~PG

customer_reviews.title: Nice computer
customer_reviews.text: I love this computer, made by the company formerly called Toshiba, now called Dynabook. I always liked Toshiba computers, and this one seems to be the best so far.
customer_reviews.author: Clarence Ballard

customer_reviews.title: IM VERY HAPPY THANK YOU SO MUCH!
customer_reviews.text: A GREAT VALUE FOR THE MONEY! THE LAPTOP I RECEIVED ONLY HAS 3 USB PORTS ONE ON THE RIGHT AND TWO ON THE LEFT NOT TWO ON BOTH SIDES LIKE IN THE PICTURE BUT A VERY FAST USER FRIENDLY LAPTOP! THANKS AGAIN!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Stick with Toshiba!
customer_reviews.text: Overall I love it! Using it for college, the speed and storage space is going to last me a long time. I have no complaint about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Toshiba laptop and just love them
customer_reviews.author: Donald Bishman

customer_reviews.title: simple to set up/start using
customer_reviews.text: my 7 yo Toshiba Satellite kept getting slower and slower, screen turning blue, and Apache Open Office crashing, so I took it to a tech guy. While he worked on it, it crashed and died. I looked around for the same brand which they call a dynabook now. I saw it was used mostly by students but kept reading the reviews; it had what I wanted including a DVD. I like to watch movies and sometimes play games. Mostly got it for writing stories, and articles for my blog, and research for same. Am also working on a book. It's a lot lighter than the older laptop and thinner. Very pleased, and would recommend others buying this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: captainbars

customer_reviews.title: Photo is not True
customer_reviews.text: The photo shows a dvd drive, plain as day . It also shows a Toshiba computer. It also had the dvd speed in the specs which is now gone. When this came in it has no dvd and an offbrand name. Photo is miss leading if that is what you want.
customer_reviews.author: CHUCK

customer_reviews.title: Missing the DVD/RW
customer_reviews.text: I love Toshiba products and so far the Tecra dynabook however it did not have the DVD/RW installed. I have contacted the supplier to find out how they want to resolve this issue, so we will see
customer_reviews.author: Scott Murray

customer_reviews.title: Good computer
customer_reviews.text: It’s light User friendly It has a different name on the computer than what i was expecting It will be great for when I go back to school.
customer_reviews.author: Sara welch

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: After 2 Dell laptop, I got the Toshiba. So far it is working great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
